name: Coursera Squadron
description:
Install instructions

This is 2D Shooter "Coursera Squadron".

Modifications:

  1. Redesigned Main Menu, buttons - planets;
  2. Created 3 levels (Earth,  Asteroids, Blackhole);
  3. GUI - added Minimap, enemies counter, lives counter, level text.
